Message: FPL 2015 starts tomorrow! Peter, Wayne and the rest of the FPL team are looking forward to seeing you at the Royal Institution. #FPL2015
Welcome to FPL 2015! Registration opens at 08:15 in the Ante Room. #FPL2015
The welcome session is starting in the Theatre in five minutes. #FPL2015
The keynote Extending the Power of FPGAs to Software Developers by Salil Raje is starting in the Theatre. #FPL2015
The PhD Forum poster session will be starting in the Georgian Room shortly. #FPL2015
Applications 1: Linear Algebra and Control Applications is starting in the Theatre. #FPL2015
Architectures & Technology 1: Energy-efficient and Low-power Architectures is starting in the Conversation Room now. #FPL2015
Design Methods & Tools 1: Parallelism and Logic Design will be starting in the Demo Room shortly. #FPL2015
Please join us for lunch in the Library and Georgian Rooms. #FPL2015
David Lariviere's keynote, Applications of FPGAs to the Financial Trading Industry, is in the Theatre now. #FPL2015
Our special session, FPL - The Past 25 Years and the Next 25 Years, is starting in the Theatre. #FPL2015
The Applications poster session is now happening in the Georgian Room. #FPL2015
The special session is recommencing in the Theatre. #FPL2015
Philip Leong is introducing the FPL significant papers in the Library. #FPL2015
It's time for Demo Night! Join us for drinks and canapes in the Library. #FPL2015
We hope you enjoyed the first day of FPL 2015. See you tomorrow! #FPL2015
It is day two of FPL 2015. Registration is now open. #FPL2015
Mike Hutton's keynote, Architectural Paths to Faster and More Robust FPGAs, is about to start in the Theatre. #FPL2015
The Architectures & Technology poster session is starting in the Georgian Room shortly. #FPL2015
Applications 2: Computer Vision and Numerical Applications is about to start in the Theatre. #FPL2015
Architectures & Technology 2: Cryptography and Security Architectures is in the Conversation Room now. #FPL2015
Design Methods & Tools 2: Accelerators and High-level Synthesis starting in the Demo Room. #FPL2015
Please join us for lunch in the Library and Georgian Rooms. #FPL2015
The keynote European High-performance Computing Strategy and Outlook by Panagiotis Tsarchopoulos is in the Theatre now. #FPL2015
Paolo Ienne is introducing FPL 2016 in the Theatre. #FPL2015
Applications 3: Pattern-matching and Search Applications is about to begin in the Theatre. #FPL2015
Architectures & Technology 3: Reconfigurable Computing and Architectures is starting in the Conversation Room. #FPL2015
Design Methods & Tools 3: Simulation and Emulation is in the Demo Room now. #FPL2015
The Design Methods & Tools poster session is in the Georgian Room. #FPL2015
Applications 4: High-level Synthesis and Optimisation is about to begin in the Theatre. #FPL2015
Architectures & Technology 4: Architectures and Synthesis is starting in the Conversation Room. #FPL2015
Design Methods & Tools 4: Hybrid FPGA-based Systems is in the Demo Room now. #FPL2015
That was another great day of talks at FPL 2015!
Don't forget that the FPL 2015 banquet is at Imperial College in South Kensington at 18:15. #FPL2015
Enjoy the banquet! #FPL2015
